name: Food Simulator Drive thru Game
description:
Dive into the city life culture with our drive-thru restaurant game! The game is brimming with the latest features and amazing graphics and will give you a genuine taste of big city life as a chef and owner of a modern drive-thru restaurant!

Manage your customers!
Manage the long lines outside your café. It is the ideal opportunity for the drive-through & takeaway restaurant! Fulfill the order, pack the food well, and serve your clients with a smile! This is the best time management game you will play!

Prepare & Unlock all Recipes
Unlock your favourite food recipes, the most recent kinds of doughnuts and a wide range of fillings for your snacks all in your own kitchen. Go to the Pizza Corner, Chillers Corner, and Bakery Corner to set up everybody's requests. Appreciate the gourmet specialist's life in a unique way!

Become a part of Restaurant Business
It is a fun and stimulating food making game in which you will transform into a busy chef and manage the extent of different diners around. You will manage a couple of exquisite bistros to earn profits and expand your food chain. You will deal with all the functions of each department of your cafe business.

Unlock new features
As you progress and level up, you can hire professional culinary specialists and purchase modern equipment for your kitchen. You can in like manner introduce new dishes for your menus to obtain a higher number of customers. Work hard to keep up a high star level and show the town that you have the stuff to regulate a foodie street!

Highlights

-3D environment feels like a genuine experience
-Modern dishes and trendy snacks for you to cook
-Interesting levels of the game keeps you engaged for quite a long time
-Play More than 200 levels

So download the best foodie game of the year with a bunch of crazy and most recent features! This is your opportunity to become a part of the most fun game ever.
